reviewText: The title is in Spanish and the item description says "Language : Spanish". However, the movie is in English only with Spanish subtitles. I bought this for my mother who only speaks Spanish. Not wanting to have her speed-read the subtitles throughout the movie, I didn't end up giving her the dvd.
did not realize it was just spanish subtitles

Everyone in the world should see this video which is also in English format. This is a TRUE story and it happened in Fatima, Portugal in the year 1917. If Catholics had listened to Our Lady of Fatima, our world would have progressed in a much more peaceful fashion. But Catholics did not choose to listen, so now we are facing what we face....the culture of death!
